name: ORDER_AUDIT_TRL
description: This table contains orders that are being audited and their current audit status.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of users who audited the order.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRL_AUTH_ID
columns.description: The user who authorized the audit.

columns.name: AUDIT_TRL_AUTH_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
